PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_CoolingTowerTypeCommon
PropertySetDef.Definition: Cooling tower type common attributes.\X\0D WaterRequirement attribute unit type modified in IFC2x2 Pset Addendum.

PropertyDef.Name: AmbientDesignDryBulbTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Ambient design dry bulb temperature used for selecting the cooling tower.

PropertyDef.Name: AmbientDesignWetBulbTemperature
PropertyDef.Definition: Ambient design wet bulb temperature used for selecting the cooling tower.

PropertyDef.Name: BasinReserveVolume
PropertyDef.Definition: Volume between operating and overflow levels in cooling tower basin.

PropertyDef.Name: CapacityControl
PropertyDef.Definition: FanCycling: Fan is cycled on and off to control duty.\X\0D TwoSpeedFan: Fan is switched between low and high speed to control duty.\X\0D VariableSpeedFan: Fan speed is varied to control duty.\X\0D DampersControl: Dampers modulate the air flow to control duty.\X\0D BypassValveControl: Bypass valve modulates the water flow to control duty.\X\0D MultipleSeriesPumps: Turn on/off multiple series pump to control duty.\X\0D TwoSpeedPump: Switch between high/low pump speed to control duty.\X\0D VariableSpeedPump: vary pump speed to control duty.

PropertyDef.Name: CircuitType
PropertyDef.Definition: OpenCircuit: Exposes water directly to the cooling atmosphere.\X\0D CloseCircuit: The fluid is separated from the atmosphere by a heat exchanger.\X\0D Wet: The air stream or the heat exchange surface is evaporatively cooled.\X\0D Dry: No evaporation into the air stream.\X\0D DryWet: A combination of a dry tower and a wet tower.

PropertyDef.Name: ControlStrategy
PropertyDef.Definition: FixedExitingWaterTemp: The capacity is controlled to maintain a fixed exiting water temperature.\X\0D WetBulbTempReset: The set-point is reset based on the wet-bulb temperature.

PropertyDef.Name: FlowArrangement
PropertyDef.Definition: CounterFlow: Air and water flow enter in different directions.\X\0D CrossFlow: Air and water flow are perpendicular.\X\0D ParallelFlow: air and water flow enter in same directions.

PropertyDef.Name: LiftElevationDifference
PropertyDef.Definition: Elevation difference between cooling tower sump and the top of the tower.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalCapacity
PropertyDef.Definition: Nominal cooling tower capacity in terms of heat transfer rate of the cooling tower between air stream and water stream at nominal conditions.

PropertyDef.Name: NumberOfCells
PropertyDef.Definition: Number of cells in one cooling tower unit.

PropertyDef.Name: OperationTemperatureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable operation ambient air temperature range.

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1'), provided, if there is no classification reference to a recognized classification system used.

PropertyDef.Name: SprayType
PropertyDef.Definition: SprayFilled: Water is sprayed into airflow.\X\0D SplashTypeFill: water cascades over successive rows of splash bars.\X\0D FilmTypeFill: water flows in a thin layer over closely spaced sheets.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).
